title: Condo nr Hayes Valley w/ Private Patio, Google Fiber & Optional Parkng
map_address: 851 Van Ness Ave near Ellis St
posting_body: Downtown/Civic Center: Condo near Hayes Valley w/ Private Patio, Google Fiber & Optional Garage Parking
851 Van Ness Ave. #202 | San Francisco, CA 94109
**You can watch a video walkthrough of the actual condo here: <URL>
**To schedule an in-person tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>
- Wood floors in main living area
- Private patio off of primary bedroom
- Massive walk in closet w/ storage system in primary bedroom
- Ensuite bathroom with tub/shower combo in primary bedroom
- Google Fiber by Webpass is available here!
- One garage parking spot is available for $200/month additional
- Water and trash included in rent
Located in the ultimate convenient location:
- Minutes to downtown, Financial District and Civic Center
- Short walk to the shops and restaurants of Hayes Valley
- Public transportation is right outside your lobby door
- Just a few minutes walk to Jefferson Square, where your dog will find new friends!
- Tenant pays non-refundable moving fee and refundable deposit to HOA.
- Pets considered on a case by case basis.
DRE# 02187202 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 851 Van Ness #202)

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
This unit may not be subject to rent increase restrictions.
